Class ComponentDecompositor

Allows to get components of serie for which itemSize > 1. For instance, for a serie named 'U' with itemSize=3, components names will be Ux, Uy and Uz. The sam applies for smatrix3 and matrix3 (appended xx...). For all other series, index number are appended to the serie's name, srating at zero.
